author: David
title: A great addition to your train layout
review:
This crossover track is great for compacting a train switching yard.

The tracks look good in dark grey (they looked better in old dark grey with the conductive metal surface), although the switching lever maintains it's current yellow colour - would look better in black in my opinion.

The box it came in was, as usual, too big for the contents - obvious marketing ploy, but it just encourages me to purchase less sets due to the bulk.

I am pleased with how TLC have given us the RC train units with cheaper tracks. My review of 4531 included a wish for this.

I think now that TLC could drop the clip-together tracks (I assume they used this to get a good electrical connection) and go back to joining the tracks together with 8x2 plates.

I'm now anticipating a three-way point to be released, and hope for more track layout accessories in the future.

title: not a true crossing
review:
